RA01 AnimaTech Living Battery TEL
6 6 6 6 6 Artifact Creature - Construct Creature 0/3
2 Ensoul Avatar, Ensoul Avatar, Ensoul Avatar (When this creature enters, you may exile an Avatar you control until this leaves the battlefield. If you do, this creature gets +2/+1 gains the exiled card’s abilities and is a Transmortal and an Avatar in addition to its other types. This stacks.) Defender, haste {T}: For each card exiled with AnimaTech Living Battery, add CC and you get {E}.
RM07 Kzaandapocl, Uncapturable TEL
UR UR 10UR 10UR 10UR 12 12 Legendary Creature - Elder Dragon Creature 12/12
2 Flying When you cast Kzaandapocl, Uncapturable, create an amount of Treasure tokens equal to the amount of mana spent to cast him. If Kzaandapocl, Uncapturable would be exiled, put him into your hand instead. Projection 2UR (If you cast this spell for its projection cost, it’s a 2/2 Avatar enchantment in addition to its other types. If it would die, instead return it to your hand, then discard a card.)
